item.title: SWN
item.description: score:83 Chances: Significantly high institutional ownership implies Southwestern Energy’s stock price is sensitive to their actions and sentiment. Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aided Southwestern’s Q4 earnings, indicating positive potential for the company’s future performance. The longer-term bull case for natural gas, including expanding U.
